vsParam:
Today's assignment is synthesizing soup
with Leek used as herbs.

You can use Leek to heal your wounds,
and it could also be stewed or fried into cuisines.

Leek-made cuisines could drive the cold
and work well as the cold cure.

Go to the forest to gather Leek,
and then synthesize it with other ingredients.
Bring the Leek Soup here after it's cooked.
